properties.validation-details-attribute-name: /Identifiant IS NOT NULL AND /Code_specialite IS NOT NULL

properties.distinctQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT "Identifiant", "Code_specialite", "Categorie_professionnelle" FROM FLOWFILE 
WHERE "Identifiant" IS NOT NULL
  AND "Code_specialite" IS NOT NULL
